title: Qatar Airways CABIN CREW: FINAL INTERVIEW Day 3 tips by Misskaykrizz

Star Method is something That Will Help You struc-
Structure Your Answer so you will look good okay so star method
S stands for Situation
T stands for the task
A Stands for The actions Taken
R Stands for The Resolution or the results so you answer your questions in this Format so
For Example Tell Us of the biggest obstacle that you have overcome in your life so s?

task
